long_description: The waterproof Kurgo Stowe hammock seat protector helps shield the front and back of your car seats from slobber, footprints and hair while giving your dog a comfy place to rest during a ride. 6 bungee cord attachment points keep the hammock in place and make it easy to install and remove. Sueded, 600-denier polyester with PVC backing is waterproof, washable and stain resistant. The Kurgo Stowe hammock seat protector features rip-and-stick openings that allow you to incorporate seat belt and child seat.
short_description: The waterproof Kurgo Stowe hammock seat protector helps shield the front and back of your car seats from slobber, footprints and hair while giving your dog a comfy place to rest during a ride.
